panels.description: SQL Server Agent status - CRITICAL if stopped
panels.title: 🤖 Agent

panels.description: Deadlocks per second - CRITICAL if > 0.1/s
panels.title: 🔒 Deadlocks

panels.description: Blocked sessions - CRITICAL if > 10
panels.title: 🚫 Blocking

panels.description: Long running queries (>30s) - CRITICAL if > 5
panels.title: ⏱️ Long Queries

panels.description: User errors per second - WARNING if > 10/s
panels.title: ⚠️ User Errors

panels.description: Transaction log space - CRITICAL if > 85%
panels.title: 📊 Log Space

panels.description: Page Life Expectancy - CRITICAL if < 300s
panels.title: 🧠 PLE

panels.description: Overall health score - higher is worse

targets.expr:
(
  ((sum by(hostname, environment) (mssql_connections{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"}) >bool 500) * 2 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((rate(mssql_deadlocks_total{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"}[5m]) >bool 0.1) * 3 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((mssql_blocking_session_count{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} >bool 10) * 2 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((mssql_agent_status{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} ==bool 0) * 5 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((mssql_long_running_queries{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} >bool 5) * 2 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((mssql_page_life_expectancy_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} <bool 300) * 2 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((count by(hostname, environment) (mssql_backup_status{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment", backup_type="Full"} != 1) >bool 0) * 1 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
  + on(hostname, environment) ((count by(hostname, environment) (mssql_database_state{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} != 0) >bool 0) * 3 or on(hostname, environment) (mssql_uptime_seconds{hostname="$instance", environment="$environment"} * 0))
)
